  2. Surprising Sleep Discovery Suggests We've Been Missing The Brain's Micro-Naps  ScienceAlert
  3. Our brains take naps while we're awake – and wake when we're asleep  New Atlas
  4. Micro-naps in the brain: Some regions sleep while others stay awake  Earth.com
  5. Brain regions exhibit sleep-wake flicker, groundbreaking study reveals  NewsBytes
